name: MartAnne's Breakfast Palace
description: MartAnne's is a beloved Flagstaff institution serving creative, delicious breakfast and lunch in a colorful, eclectic atmosphere. The menu features hearty portions with fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. Kids love the pancakes and the fun, artistic decor throughout the restaurant.
shortDescription: Colorful, eclectic breakfast spot with creative dishes and a kid-friendly vibe.
topPickReason: Best breakfast in town with a welcoming atmosphere for families and creative menu options kids love.
tips: Expect a wait on weekends - worth it!
The pancakes are huge - consider sharing
Don't miss the fresh-squeezed orange juice

name: Toasted Owl Cafe
description: The Toasted Owl is a charming café serving farm-to-table breakfast and lunch with an emphasis on fresh, healthy options. The cozy atmosphere and excellent coffee make it a favorite among locals. They offer plenty of options for picky eaters while parents enjoy gourmet dishes.
shortDescription: Farm-to-table café with healthy options and excellent coffee in a cozy setting.
tips: Smaller space - not great for large groups

name: Chick-fil-A
description: Chick-fil-A in Flagstaff is a reliable family favorite with its signature chicken sandwiches and nuggets. The indoor playground makes it perfect for families with young children who need to burn energy. Quick service and consistently good food make it a go-to for busy families.
shortDescription: Fast-casual chicken restaurant with indoor playground for kids.

name: Black Bart's Steakhouse
description: Black Bart's is a unique Flagstaff experience featuring singing waitstaff from NAU's music program. The Western-themed steakhouse serves hearty American fare in a fun, theatrical atmosphere. Kids love the live musical performances and the Old West decor.
shortDescription: Western-themed steakhouse with singing waitstaff and Old West atmosphere.
tips: Great for birthdays and special occasions
Arrive early to look around the gift shop

name: Fat Olives
description: Fat Olives serves authentic Italian cuisine in a warm, family-friendly environment. Known for their handmade pasta and wood-fired pizzas, it's a hit with kids and adults alike. The relaxed atmosphere and attentive service make dining with children enjoyable.
shortDescription: Family-friendly Italian restaurant with handmade pasta and wood-fired pizzas.
tips: The pizza is a crowd-pleaser for kids
Ask about the daily pasta specials

name: Crown Railroad Cafe
description: Crown Railroad Cafe is a train-themed diner that delights kids of all ages. Located in a converted train car, the restaurant serves classic American breakfast and lunch. A model train runs around the ceiling, and train memorabilia covers the walls.
shortDescription: Train-themed diner in a converted rail car with model trains and classic American food.
tips: Sit where you can see the model train
